Text.Page:
Our efforts in the region are threatened by tentacullars and those blasted besharans. I want you to put a stop to it forthwith!

Get out there and hunt {@LinkCreature:41#2008#swamp} and {@LinkCreature:41#2009#mire tentacullars}, and {@LinkCreature:41#2002#besharan enforcers} and {@LinkCreature:41#2006#smugglers} near the Arena of Blood and Feral Valley.

Report your progress to Keltaria at Emissary Point. Take the field!
You earned this reward, <PCNAME>. Enjoy it.

We're under a lot of pressure from the federation to get rid of as many of those creatures as we can.

They're willing to pay, of course.
